tool_description: search and fetch latest news articles from 20,000 news sources.
name: Latest News
title: Latest News

api_list.name: Latest News API
api_list.description: Specrom Analytics’ News API let’s you query for news by either mentioning query keyword in title, main content, or fetch all news by domain address or news topic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
